ygData.subject: Hi Guys :)
ygData.msgSnippet: Well i woke up this morning and was trying to logg on to EQ forgetting that it was wednesday and there was a huge patch :(. So I logged on to Everlore and was
ygData.messageBody:
Well i woke up this morning and was trying to
logg on to EQ forgetting that it was wednesday and
there was a huge patch :(. So I logged on to Everlore
and was looking around the E'ci thing and saw this
club i figured why not sounds like fun.Please Excuse
my name it is very old and all my friends know it
now so i havent changed it. Well anyways i have a lvl
29 warrior, lvl 12 wiz, lvl 12 monk, lvl 10 rogue,
lvl 16 druid, lvl 8 enchanter. i have been playing
this game for a while and i have lots of lvl 40+
friends. So If I can help any of you just give me a tell.
i mostly play my warrior his name is Engaged or My
wiz (I am falling in love with) his name is Zedicus
so plz give me some tells and i will help you all
out if i can. I am also a member of the Fist Of
Righteousness it is a great guild i recomend you all check out
our page! it is www.pernet.net/~jebfun1 it is one of
the best guild pages i have ever seen! well enough
about me. Ohh yeah here is my Idea of a perfect
party..<br>1) warrior any race they are all pretty close<br>2)
wizard BOOM! need I say more<br>3) rangers are nice if
you are not in a dungeon<br>4) Cleric <br>5) cleric
yes i love clerics but I am also a warrior<br>6)
druid or shaman for SoW and STR buffs man i love
SoW!<br><br>well I will check this out about once or twice a day
so plz give me a tell i am always wanting to help
newbies and willing to hunt with others :)
